channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MT

item.title: Report X-2023090536
item.description:
Report X-2023090536

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-05T15:12:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-05
  • City: GREAT FALLS
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was being unloaded off the Sams Club Customer Spot trailer when the package handlers noticed a bleach mark on one of the boxes. Box was given to QA and upon inspection at 17:30, found that one of the 4 containers was leaking at the nozzle. Package contains 2 5.3 Liter Containers and 2 32 OZ Spray containers of the same substance. DescribePack: Failure at nozzle due to improper bracing. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Package was handed to QA and placed in salvage drum to minimize exposure.

item.title: Report E-2023090815
item.description:
Report E-2023090815

  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDEX FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Associate did not block and/or brace freight properly for transport. Freight was crushed causing release of product.

item.title: Report X-2023090495
item.description:
Report X-2023090495

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-03T15:13:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-29
  • City: BILLINGS
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package was brought to me by driver because the box was wet. Upon my inspection I found that there were 5 spray bottles of spa essentials filter cleaner in a box that was not labelled a hazmat, nor was it declared, of those 5 bottles 1 of them had a spray top that had come unscrewed causing it to spill out. DescribePack: the spray bottle tops had come unscrewed DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: after putting on gloves and reviewing product info. i tightened the cap back on
